Get help with Rackspace Technology billing#

If youâ€™re unable to find the information that you need in the Rackspace Technology Portal or if you need more detailed billing and payment information, contact the Billing Support team. This team is available Monday through Friday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. CST, toll-free at 877 934 0410 or internationally at 1 210 581 0410. You can reach the Cloud Accounts Receivable team toll-free at 800 480 2716 or internationally at 1 210 312 4000.
